title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.3 - General conditions of program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 72.3 - General conditions of program

State Regulations
(a) The department shall provide, on a
competitive basis, State assistance payments to applicants for the partial
funding of secondary materials market development or waste prevention
activities. (b) State assistance
payments shall not exceed 50 percent of the project cost. (c) The department may consult with the

Department of Environmental Conservation prior to entering into contracts with
applicants to provide State assistance payments towards the cost of secondary
materials utilization or waste prevention projects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
72.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
